content:
You're welcome! I'm thrilled to have been able to recommend a book that fits your reading mood. 'The Witch Elm' is a fantastic choice, and I think you'll really appreciate Tana French's writing style in a standalone novel. Her ability to craft atmosphere and suspense is unparalleled, and I'm sure you'll find yourself fully immersed in the world of the Ivy House and its secrets.

If you have any more questions or need further recommendations, feel free to ask! I'm always here to help. Otherwise, happy reading, and I hope you enjoy 'The Witch Elm'!

(By the way, if you'd like to discuss the book once you've finished it, I'd be more than happy to chat with you about it. No spoilers, of course!)
